column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Suki says : " Sokka , what 's going on ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " I do n't have much time .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , and we 're escaping today , on the gondola .
#Text=" Suki says : " What ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " My dad and I came up with the plan together .
#Text=We 're gon na commandeer the gondola and we 're gon na take a hostage with us so they wo n't cut the lines .
#Text=" Suki says : " We 'll never make it onto the gondola .
#Text=There 's too many guards .
#Text=" Sokka says : " My dad already thought of that .
#Text=He said we 'll need a distraction .
#Text=That 's why we 're gon na start a prison riot .
#Text=" Suki says : " Okay , let 's say by some miracle this all works and we make it on the gondola .
#Text=The warden will still just cut the lines , even if we have a captive .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Not if the warden is the captive .
#Text=I have to go .
#Text=I 'll find you before we start the riot .
#Text=" Male guard says : " Hey , you , the warden wants to see you !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why ?
#Text=" Male guard says : " I do n't know , I did n't ask .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Maybe I could schedule another time with him ?
#Text=How 's tomorrow ?
#Text=" Male guard says : " He wants to see you ... now .
#Text="
